revised_title: Enzyme Action and the Oxidation of Xanthin and Hypoxanthin
tldr: The author discusses enzyme action and the oxidation of xanthin and hypoxanthin. They propose that the enzyme is a selective catalyst and classify enzymes into two categories: homo-lytic and hetero-lytic. The study reveals that the enzyme can influence or direct attack at two centers simultaneously in hypoxanthin, while affecting only one in xanthin.
